column4: Re-incarnation, no. I do belive the spirit lives on without the body, though. Mainly because whenever I go upstairs, my grandpa's spirit likes to hang out and freak me out when I need to pee. :/
I'm serious, we keep his ashes, and I can feel him around whenever I go near that damn jar. :/
Jerub- Did you notice that this teeny little distrobution has climbed up to rank 13 on distrowatch since it's release? :P
